name: Snapmaker J1 (0.2 nozzle)
machine_start_gcode:
;***** Snapmaker J1
;***** Update  : 20221222
;***** Printer : [printer_preset]
;***** Profile : [print_preset]
M593  P1 X F35.7 
M593  P1 Y F33.7 
M355 S1 P16    ;------------OPTIONAL                ;dim led 
M83 ;absolute extrusion mode
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ;Start Warming Bed
T[initial_extruder] ;switch to initial extruder
{if total_toolchanges < 1}; Preheat one extruder (just one used)
M104 S160 ;preheat nozzle
{else}; Preheat both extruders used
M104 S160 T0 ;preheat T0
M104 S160 T1 ;preheat T1
{endif}
G28 ; home all axes
G90 ;absolute positioning
G1 Z0.8 F1800
M201 X5000 Y5000 Z500 E5000
M205 V5
M900 T0 K0.02
M900 T1 K0.02
M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature]  ; C3 W2 Wait For Bed Temperature
{if total_toolchanges < 1}; Heat one extruder
M104 S[first_layer_temperature]
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ;Wait for Hotend Temperature
{else}; Heat both extruders
M104 T0 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}
M104 T1 S{first_layer_temperature[1]}
M109 T0 S{first_layer_temperature[0]} ;Wait for Hotend Temperature
M109 T1 S{first_layer_temperature[1]} ;Wait for Hotend Temperature
{endif}
;
{if 1==1}      ;-----------OPTIONAL                 ;led effect
  M355 S1 P32
  G4 S1
  M355 S1 P48
  G4 S1
  M355 S1 P64
  G4 S1
  M355 S1 P96
  G4 S1
  M355 S1 P128
  G4 S1
  M355 S1 P255
{endif}
;
G92 E0
;
{if total_toolchanges > 0 or initial_extruder == 0}; Purge line T0
T0
G92 E0
G1 F1200 X5 Z0.5
G1 F600 X100 E20
G1 F600 Z2
G92 E0
G1 F1200 E-6
G0 X-20 F12000 ; park T0
{endif}
{if total_toolchanges > 0 or initial_extruder == 1}; Purge line T1
T1
G92 E0
G1 F1200 X295 Z0.5
G1 F600 X200 E20
G1 F600 Z2
G92 E0
G1 F1200 E-6
G0 X350 F12000 ; park T1 (old 345)
{endif}
;End Start Gcode J1
machine_end_gcode:
;End GCode J1 begin
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off 
G90 ;absolute positioning
G92 E0
;
G1 E-6 F300 ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
;
M104 S0 T0 ;extruder heater off
M104 S0 T1 ;extruder heater off
;
G1 Z200 F1500 ;move bed down
G0 Y10 F3000 ;so the head is out of the way
M84 ;steppers off
M355 S1 P16    ;------------OPTIONAL                ;dim led 
M107
;End of Gcode
;
; DON'T REMOVE these lines if you're using the smfix (https://github.com/macdylan/Snapmaker2Slic3rPostProcessor)
; min_x = [first_layer_print_min_0]
; min_y = [first_layer_print_min_1]
; max_x = [first_layer_print_max_0]
; max_y = [first_layer_print_max_1]
; max_z = [max_layer_z]
;
